about_the_game:
A sick psychotherapist, gradually sinking into the fathomless depths of his dark fantasies, found a very unusual way of research. He decided to catch victims and keep them in his sinister net to study the behaviors behind the instincts. You are one of those victims who will have the chance to experience the full range of horrors prepared by your new therapist. You have very little time, think or die.

Features:
- Realistic AAA-quality graphics;
- A large number of puzzles and riddles;
- Decisions on which the course of the game depends;
- An abundance of objects for interactions;
- An unusual plot;
- Screamers and more.
detailed_description:
A sick psychotherapist, gradually sinking into the fathomless depths of his dark fantasies, found a very unusual way of research. He decided to catch victims and keep them in his sinister net to study the behaviors behind the instincts. You are one of those victims who will have the chance to experience the full range of horrors prepared by your new therapist. You have very little time, think or die.

Features:
- Realistic AAA-quality graphics;
- A large number of puzzles and riddles;
- Decisions on which the course of the game depends;
- An abundance of objects for interactions;
- An unusual plot;
- Screamers and more.
name: Patient No. 26

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K@3.3GHz or AMD FX 6300@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (2 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 7 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bits
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4770K@3.5GHz or Ryzen 5 1500X@3.5GHz
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce RTX 2060 (6 GB) or AMD Radeon RX 6600 (8 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 7 GB available space

short_description: Patient No. 26 is an exciting horror game where the player finds himself in the dark world of an abandoned laboratory, where a sinister doctor conducts creepy experiments on his patients. You are patient No. 26 and you are fighting for your life, overcoming the challenges set by a mad doctor.
supported_languages:
English*, Russian*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
*languages with full audio support
